item.description:
Let's meet to watch the game, play some games, talk about family items that came up over the holiday (or not). Enjoy some lite snacks and a couple drinks. I'd love to play pool with someone too!

It should be a good game against the Pittsburgh Steelers. We all know Matt Cassell's been doing well lately, so who knows wher they'll go from here.

See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a MeetUp sign & #50 Vrabel jersey (white). Cell # is 508-265-2889.
item.name: Patriots Football - Jillians
